Vendors - SOMI Art Fest Skip to main content Skip to footer Home Attend Visit Artist List Festival Program Exhibit For Artists Vendors Support Us Volunteer Become a Sponsor Award Winners About Us Contact Home Attend Visit Artist List Festival Program Exhibit For Artists Vendors Support Us Volunteer Become a Sponsor Award Winners About Us Contact Vendors Vendors Our Vendors Our festival celebrates the creativity and diversity of the arts, and we’re committed to providing a wide variety of delicious and unique food options for our visitors to enjoy. At our festival, you’ll have the opportunity to showcase your products to a diverse audience of art lovers and enthusiasts. Some key details about our festival application process Vendors interested in participating in our festival should contact us. Selection process Our selection committee will review all applications and select vendors based on quality as well as how they fit with the festival's theme and vision. Booth Space Vendors selected to participate in our festival will be provided with a designated booth space Sales Vendors are responsible for selling their own items at the festival. Vendors are encouraged to bring marketing materials such as business cards or brochures. We welcome vendors of all types and backgrounds to apply to participate in our festival. Whether you’re a startup or an established business, we believe that our festival provides an exciting opportunity to showcase your products and engage with a wider community. If you’re interested in participating in our festival as a vendor, please fill out the application below. Food Vendors Vendors Vendors Frequently Asked Questions When is SOMI Art Fest? The festival is held every year the weekend after Presidents’ Day. Our next festival is February 21 and 22, 2026. Where is the festival located? The festival is located in the downtown area of South Miami on Sunset Drive (SW 72nd Street) from US 1 to Red Road (SW 57th Avenue.)
